name: Nihal Raje Patil
summary: Immediate joiner, Data Scientist with 4.7 years of expertise in Statistical analytics, Machine Learning, and NLP. Specialized in analytics to transform complex business requirements into actionable data-driven solutions.

experience.description: Developed conversational AI and business-supporting tools including a chatbot and real-time document matching system.
Worked on vast datasets to train and build ML algorithms, achieving client-desired accuracies.

education.institution: Dr. D.Y. Patil Institute of Management

projects.title: Revolutionizing Healthcare Compliance
projects.description: Developed a system with Hugging Face models and AWS for risk assessment in healthcare.

projects.title: Enhancing Healthcare Claim Prognostication
projects.description: Enhanced claim prognosis with multifaceted machine learning ensembles and biomarkers.
